name: publish-release
description: This GitHub Action (written in TypeScript) uses the [GitHub Release API](https://developer.github.com/v3/repos/releases/), specifically the [Update a Release](https://developer.github.com/v3/repos/releases/#update-a-release) endpoint, to set `draft=false` on an existing release.

scripts.all: npm run build && npm run format && npm run lint && npm run package && npm test

author: Stu Yarrow
